field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will activate the SCP backup plugin.

field.label: Remote Directory
field.help: Set the remote directory to backup the config file to.

field.label: Local Root's Public Key
field.help: The public key of the local root user. This public key must be added to the remote user's authorized_keys - otherwise backups will fail.

field.label: Harden SSH Connection
field.help: When this checkbox is enabled, the SSH key exchange will result in an error if the key of the key of the server is not whitelisted.
